oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Paraconductivity in YBA2(CU1-XNIX)3O7-Y and BI2SR2CA1-XYXCU2O8+Y
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: BHATIA, SN
DHARD, CP
SASTRY, PVPSS
GOPALAKRISHNAN, IK
YAKHMI, JV
IYER, RM
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In the paraconductivity of Bi2Sr2Ca1-xYxCu2O8+y (x = 0,0.1,0.3) we find the normal conductivity sigma-n(T) to play an important role. With Anderson-Zou expression for sigma-n(T) only, we find the excess conductivity to exhibit the cross over from 2D to 3D as the Tc is approached.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: INTERNATIONAL CONF ON MATERIALS AND MECHANISMS OF SUPERCONDUCTIVITY HIGH TEMPERATURE SUPERCONDUCTORS 3,KANAZAWA, JAPAN,JUL 22-26, 1991
